name: Brawny Brothers
description:
With this jam I took the opportunity to learn how to make a genre in Unity I had never done with any of my previous games. I also only has about 2 hours a day with Saturday having about 6 hours to put this together. 

Though I ran out of time to make the game longer I am happy I was able to develop the general idea. This game takes inspiration from "The Lost Vikings" SNES game.

Theme: "Stronger Together"

Description:
You play as brothers who must stay together to overcome the obstacles ahead and save their father.

How to play:
Switch to the brother that best fits the current needs but remember to not leave one behind.

Controls:

  • Move: A, D, Left Arrow, Right Arrow
  • Jump: SPACE (only the Archer can jump)
  • Left Mouse Click, CRTL:
    • Archer: shoots arrow
    • Knight: toggles shield position
  • Swap Brothers: F
  • Interact: E

Credits:

  • Game Design and Programming: Nelson L.
